McKaig Chevrolet Buick is A Dealer "FOR the People."(R) What makes us different? Why are we special? "We believe everyone deserves to drive a nicer, newer(R) car today that is safe, reliable and fun to drive for as long as they wish to own it." "For The People"(R) Pledge: We are a Dealer FOR The People. That means we put our customers first, before everything else. We believe that everyone deserves to drive a nicer, newer car today. Our business is not selling cars. Our business is finding solutions to the everyday problems that keep most people stuck in a car they hate. We're on a mission to change the world by helping people get the car they want and deserve. Our goal is to make you a customer guest for Life! Kent & Mark Abernathy, "Brothers of Savings" FOR The People Reviewers Rank us #1 in East Texas Home of Non-Commissioned Sales Solution Specialists - No Sharks in the Showroom This means we don't try to push product or sell you anything not in your best interest as our Solution Specialists make the same thing on whatever you buy. We help you decide what you want to buy! Se Habla Espanol Home of the Buyer's Bill of Rights! -Home of Non-Commission Sales Solution Staff! No Bullies in the Showroom! -Se Habla Español! "We believe everyone deserves to drive a nicer, newer(R) car that is safe, reliable and fun to drive for as long as they wish to own it."

November 25, 2019
SERVICE VISIT

"Great Service"

- ConnieNicholas

We were out-of-state travelers with an electrical/transmission/speedometer problem and McKaig took care of us very well. From the initial call with Fran to the employees that kept checking on our welfare and offering coffee and water we were treated like valued long-standing customers. Mariela kept us informed and understood the importance of passing the problem history directly to the mechanic. Tyler did the computer diagnostic, listened to the various symptoms, test drove, made the repair, and test drove it again to confirm all was well. We even received gift cards to McDonald's across the street for our lunch since we had been waiting so long. Everyone at McKaig was a great blessing to us in our time of need. We were diagnosed, fixed, and on our way in about 4 hours, much better than we expected!

- Markaroberts

Went in to see what options I had on buying a truck. My salesman was Kalimba and I couldnt be happier with the outcome. Kalimba helped get me in exactly what I was looking for. Nobody at the dealership was pushy or what you tend to expect from a dealership. They were all respectful and genuinely want to help their customers. 10/10 would recommend!

November 21, 2019
SALES VISIT - USED

"This was my first time to buy a car by myself. I just..."

- Alexachantaewhite

This was my first time to buy a car by myself. I just graduated college in May and had a 2012 Chrysler 200. I did not have any credit and did not think I would be able to even get a car. Adrian was able to help me and really explain what the process would be like. I was about to get a great deal and get the car I wanted which was a 2019 Encore Buick. I would recommend buying from Mckaig dealership and getting help from Adrian Cortes.

Nov 22, 2019 -
Nov 22, 2019 -

McKaig Chevrolet Buick - A Dealer For The People responded

We very much appreciate the opportunity to earn your business and especially for taking the time to write a great review about your McKaig experience. We are on a mission to change the car buying experience in East Texas and thank you for letting others know that we are different than most car dealers. More and more East Texans are making the drive to Gladewater for their nicer, newer car to get our non-commissioned Solution Specialists to help them decide what they want to buy. We are honored you picked McKaig and that we were able to help you buy your first car by yourself. Enjoy your nicer, newer NEW 2019 Buick Encore and we appreciate your recommending McKaig to others. Thank you again and we look forward to helping you as well as your family and friends in the future. Sincerely, Your "For The People" East Texas Buick Dealer McKAIG Chevrolet Buick Gladewater, Texas
